The seventh through the twelfth base tones/sub-frequency bands and seventh through the ninth overtones/sub-fre- quency bands of the third dimension were blocked out of the third chakra, and the nadial capsule, which naturally separates the third-dimensional/men- tal body, and fourth-dimensional/astral body levels of the bio-energetic field, developed a second barrier, creating an even larger gap between the con- scious mental awareness and the astral level of awareness. ln sleep the con- sciousness could travel into the astral identity, but now there would be a gap 77
